[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [b][u]About:[/u][/b] There was something wrong with Hemogenic Pawns requiring food for survival. This mod makes Hemogenic Pawns capable of getting by on just Hemogen Packs.
[b][u]What this does:[/u][/b] [list] [*] BloodFeed used on Living Pawns provides 1.0 * BodySize worth of Food. (~100% of Vanilla) [*] BloodFeed used on Living Pawns now gives the Biter a +8 mood buff, which can stack 5 times. [/list] [list] [*] [strike]Surgery to Extract Hemogen Packs no longer requires medicine, or anaesthetises the Pawn.[/strike] (Now Vanilla Behaviour) [*] Hemogen Packs provide 1.0 nutrition. (100% of Vanilla) [*] Hemogen Packs now give Hemogenic Pawns a +4 mood buff. [/list]
[b][u]Future Ideas?[/u][/b] [list] [*] Options for everything [*] Modify StackLimit Option [*] Hemogenic Pawns prefer/seek Hemogen Packs [*] Food makes Hemogenic Pawns sick. (Food Poisoning) + Options [*] Extracting HemogenPacks or BloodFeeding from sick pawns will transfer the sickness to the Patient/Biter [/list]
[b][u]Thanks:[/u][/b] My many thanks go out to Feldoh, and many others of the Rimworld modding discord.
[b][u]Search Tags:[/u][/b] Xenohuman, Vamp, Vampire, Blood, Sippy, Sanguine, Sanguophage, Masquerade, etc...
